body_content.explanation: a very powerful bomb dropped from an aircraft that is designed to explode just above the ground:
examples: It is likely they had daisy cutters which detonate above ground and release smaller explosives over a huge area.
The plane was used as a bomber to drop weapons such as the "daisy-cutter".

body_content.explanation: a ball kicked, hit, or thrown so that it rolls along the ground or hits the ground several times:
examples: She scored with a powerful daisy cutter from 10 yards out.
I bowled him out with a daisy-cutter.
